title: Death of God
description: Life turns upside down for a normal young boy having normal dreams when he is told that he is the incarnation of God. A struggle begins between those who know that he is the one that they were looking for and between the boy who has never experienced anything special about himself. Will the boy realise his True Destiny or will he disagree and disown those and continue to live a normal life.The book is a work of fiction and in no way intends to hurt individual, community, sect or religion
author: Vipin Patwari
